channel.title: vietnamese on Yummy Collection
channel.description: Recent content in vietnamese on Yummy Collection

item.title: Do Chua
item.description: Ingredients 500g carrots 500g radish 100g sugar 2 ts of salt 250ml luke warm water 250ml vinegar (5%) containers Instructions Peel the carrots and radish. Then cut into 5x0.5 cm long pieces Put the vegetable pieces in a bowl, add salt and mix well with your hands Mix vinegar with sugar and lukewarm water well until the sugar has completely dissolved The effect of the salt makes the carrots and radish pliable.

item.title: Tofu/Lemongrass Banh Mi
item.description: Ingredients: For the tofu 500 gr tofu 2 EL lemongrass, minced 1-2 garlic cloves, minced 1 ts salt 2 Tbsp sugar pepper 1 chili, minced 4 Tbsp vegetable oil The bread baguette do chua mayonnaise coriander cucumber Instructions: Cut tofu in 1cm wide slices Mix lemon grass, garlic, salt, sugar, pepper, chili and oil Dry the tofu using a towel Rub in both sides of the tofu and let it rest for 15m.
